text: Can you help me modify a meeting reservation?
Sure. What details do you want to modify?
I need to change the start time to 2023-03-27 9:00 and add a few more attendees to my existing reservation.
Okay. To make changes to your reservation, I need your token. Let me authenticate you with our system. Please provide me with your username and password.
My username is newuser and my password is newpass.
Your token has been authenticated. What is the topic of your meeting, and where is it located?
The topic is New Employee Orientation, and it will be held in the Training Room.
And who will be attending the meeting?
The current attendees are David Wang and Amy Chen. I want to add Erica Liu to the list.
Okay, I have made the changes to your reservation. Your reservation status is now updated.
